data.persona: I am very well acquainted with the Bible. I spend a lot of time with other men of the clergy going over the tenants of the religion. I also help out nearby people who need somebody in the faith to speak with. I also deliver sermons on occasion.
data.description:
You are in the Paladins' Memorial Chapel.
The Paladins' Memorial Chapel is dominated by ornate mosaics made of thousands of tiny colored tiles in bright, vibrant colors which depict the heroic exploits of the Church's Paladins, including both victorious and tragic ones. The mosaics do not shy away from depicting bloodshed and gore. At the center is the shrine, which doubles as the Sarcophagus of the first Great Paladin. The chapel is always filled with white roses, which are reserved solely for the funerals of Paladins.
There's a the shrine, a candle, a tile, a mosaic, a Rose, and a sarcophagus here.
The people saved by the paladinsa and the local merchant are here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "desc": "The Paladins' Memorial Chapel is dominated by ornate mosaics made of thousands of tiny colored tiles in bright, vibrant colors which depict the heroic exploits of the Church's Paladins, including both victorious and tragic ones. The mosaics do not shy away from depicting bloodshed and gore. At the center is the shrine, which doubles as the Sarcophagus of the first Great Paladin. The chapel is always filled with white roses, which are reserved solely for the funerals of Paladins.",
            "extra_desc": "The Paladins' Memorial Chapel was built to commemorate the lives and deaths of the Church's many devoted Paladins. It was funded by donations by both normal people saved by the Paladins me wealthy local merchants looking to expand their own renown by proximity. The tiles were all fashioned by local workshops, and took up so much time and material that the price of porcelain and other ceramics skyrocketed during its construction.",

data.short_motivation: I need to remove my shirt to perform memorial
data.mid_motivation: I have to give proper memorial to paladin
data.long_motivation: I am preparing to perform funeral service
